title: Direct X
body:
Started a game today and the clients gave me a popup saying my Direct X was incompatible with the client.  (the day before it was fine).  
I uninstalled LoL and the R9 Nano Drivers, reinstalled everything with the latest and greatest, now I'm stuck at a reconnect screen.

Brilliant work guys, my dad used to say, if it ain't broke, don't break it to fix it.

replies.body:
There might be an issue for some players using custom resolution settings, and PC players are facing this DirectX error as a result.  Until we have a more permanent fix, we do have a work around to reset your settings to default.  Palaver is close, but I recommend deleting the Config folder entirely.

> Delete your Config folder. This is typically found at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
> 

I hope that helps for the time being!
Did nothing at all for me :P any expected time for a perm  solution ? I'm starting to decay in 2-3 days :P

SOLVED:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and delete game.cfg file, after that launch the game.
Restarted Client AGAIN and now it wants to download a patch?!  Why didn't it do this upon initial installation?!
